ctx: intros T H LiftLift k t H1.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "shift k t" in the current goal.

ctx: intros T H LiftLift k t H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type H : Lift T LiftLift : SerTop.LiftLift k : nat t : T H1 : closed k t Unable to unify "(let (lift) := H in lift) 1 0 t" with "(let (lift) := H in lift) 1 (S k) ((let (lift) := H in lift) 1 0 t)".

original: intros T H LiftLift k t H1. unfold closed. unfold shift. unfold lift. simpl. rewrite H1. reflexivity.
